Subject: RE: Customer already using Drive lock now they are looking for our Enforced Encryption Easy lock
Description:
Hi Team,

We have given the Device control and Enforced Encryption demo to the customer.

They need to encrypt the External storage devices automatically. and they have to use that pendrive after encryption process completed only.

When user is connected any external storage device into their laptop. One wizard will open automatically and that wizard will take to the encrypting the pendrive.


The existing Solution is Drive Lock.

Can we achieve this on our solutions. 

Regards,
Sai
What_We_Know__c: Went on a remote session with the customer and assisted by explaining and testing the Easylock on his device.
Next_Steps__c: Assisted the client in setting up the easy lock through global rights and groups as well as testing with a USB device.
Solution_Comment__c:
Client requested a remote session to better understand how the easy lock works.
Connected remote and assisted by explaining how the easy lock could be adjusted to be deployed automatically and how to set up the master/user passwords.
